posts.post_content:
I need this one card to complete my T210 Series 1 set. I've tried for a while, even winning one on eBay but the seller sent the "other" Lee in the Series 1 set to me and the one I won to the guy who won the one I received and refused to give it up. Nice guy! He immediately realized he had the tougher Lee and sent it in for grading (he said). Bah humbug!
Anyway, if anyone out there has this card, please let me know, I'll be glad to make you a good offer for it. Thanks.
tbob
Bob - check your messages. I think I have your card.

[quote name="Kawika" post=1823929]Bob - check your messages. I think I have your card.[/QUOTE]

Thank you so much David. I once posted how great a guy and friend you were so you know how I feel about you. 
It is so good to finally wrap up Series 1 of the T210 set. 
tbob
Congrats TBob. Another Series bites the dust!
